parameter.name: injectionEnabled
parameter.label: Use Built-in Global Variables
parameter.description:
Import all variables from the openHAB JavaScript library into all rules for common services like items, things, actions, log, etc...
If disabled, the openHAB JavaScript library can be imported manually using "require('openhab')"

parameter.name: internalLibraryEnabled
parameter.label: Use Internal Library
parameter.description:
Use the addon-included and cached openHAB JavaScript library for optimal performance.
Disable this option to allow loading the library from the disk instead, but be aware that this increases script loading times especially on less powerful systems.
